meanings.definition: A group of individuals or organizations combined to promote a common interest.
meanings.sent1: The local syndicate worked together to help the community.
meanings.sent2: The syndicate met regularly to discuss their shared goals.
meanings.sent3: The syndicate's picnic was a fun way to bond over their common cause.
meanings.sent4: The syndicate of artists painted the town with creativity.
meanings.sent5: Joining the syndicate was like joining a big family of helpers.

meanings.sent1: They decided to syndicate their efforts for a stronger impact.
meanings.sent2: She syndicated her business to reach a wider audience.
meanings.sent3: He syndicated his chores to finish them faster.
meanings.sent4: The team syndicated their skills to tackle the project together.
meanings.sent5: Syndicating their resources made the task easier to accomplish.
